text: Alloh ast, ki zaminro qarorgohi şumo soxt to dar on qaror gired va ʙar on zindagiro ʙarojaton mujassar kard va osmonro ʙaroi zamin cun ʙinoe ʙarafroxt. Va şumoro surat ʙaxşid va surathojatonro nekū soxt. Va az cizhoi pokizavu xuş rūzijaton dod. In ast Allohi ʙarhaq, ki ʙar şumo in ne'mathoro arzonī kard. Parvardigori şumost. Alloh purʙarakatu ʙuzurgvor ast, va az hama sifathoi noşoistae, ki loiqi zoti Ū nest, pok ast. Ūst Parvardigori çahonijon
